metadata.title: CVE-2024-21646 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Azure uAMQP is a general purpose C library for AMQP 1.0. The UAMQP libraryis used by several clients to implement AMQP protocol communication. Whenclients using this library receive a crafted binary type data, an integeroverflow or wraparound or memory safety issue can occur and may causeremote code execution. This vulnerability has been patched in release2024-01-01.

criterions.comment: azure-uamqp-python package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
